special_text:
[i](Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, populate or proliferate.
{R}{G}{W}: Level 2
Whenever you attack, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance that's attacking.
{1}{R}{G}{W}: Level 3
Noncombat damage from sources you control can't be prevented.
